from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import MessageTextInput, DropdownInput, StrInput, SecretStrInput
from axiestudio.template import Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import requests

class WhatsAppSender(Component):
    display_name  = "WhatsApp Message Sender"
    description   = "Send a WhatsApp message using WhatsApp Business API."
    documentation = "https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp"
    icon          = "message-square"

    inputs = [
        StrInput(
            name="whatsapp_business_account_id",
            display_name="WhatsApp Business Account ID",
            info="Your WhatsApp Business Account ID.",
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="access_token",
            display_name="Access Token",
            info="Your Facebook Graph API Access Token.",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="to_number",
            display_name="To Number",
            info="Recipient's phone number including the country code (e.g., '+19999999999').",
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="message_body",
            display_name="Message Body",
            info="The content of the message to be sent.",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Message ID", name="message_id", method="send_message"),
    ]

    def send_message(self) -> Data:
        whatsapp_business_account_id = self.whatsapp_business_account_id
        access_token = self.access_token
        to_number = self.to_number
        message_body = self.message_body

        url = f"https://graph.facebook.com/v14.0/{whatsapp_business_account_id}/messages"
        headers = {
            "Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token}",
            "Content-Type": "application/json",
        }
        payload = {
            "messaging_product": "whatsapp",
            "to": to_number,
            "type": "text",
            "text": {
                "body": message_body
            }
        }

        response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers)
        response_data = response.json()

        if response.status_code == 200:
            message_id = response_data['messages'][0]['id']
            self.status = f'WhatsApp Message sent to {to_number}'
            return Data(data={"message_id": message_id})
        else:
            self.status = f"Failed to send message: {response_data.get('error', {}).get('message')}"
            return Data(data={"message_id": None})
